title: how to report people intentionally feeding?
body:
I realize there's an in game report system but it doesn't actually work...

long story short 
- gold 3 promos lost due to afk
- played a few ranked games today
- just played a game with this guy  - FIFA who intentionally fed the entire game because he was last pick and got jg instead of adc
- looked at his match history and he seems to have a history of doing it regularly (http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=fifa)
